column1: HYDRAULIC CEMENT: WORLD PRODUCTION, BY COUNTRY OR LOCALITY1, 2
1Table includes data available through November 1, 2021. All data are reported unless otherwise noted.
2World totals, U.S. data and estimated data are rounded to no more than three significant digits
column2: may not add to totals shown. even where presented unrounded, reported data are thought to be accurate to no more than three significant digits. Data are from a variety of sources, including the European Cement Association. Data may include clinker exports for some countries.

column1: 3Production is based on fiscal year, with a starting date of June 30 of the year shown.
4Production is based on fiscal year, with a starting date of March 31 of the year shown.
5Production is based on fiscal year, with a starting date of July 7 of the year shown.
6Cement sales from Cimentos de Moçambique SARL (Sociedade Anónima de Responsabilidade Limitada) only.
7Portland and masonry cements only. Includes a small (less than 0.5% per year) component of double counting where portland cement (not clinker) is consumed to make masonry cement
column2: the precise amount of double counting cannot be determined because of the involvement of portland cement stockpiles.
